column4: if i'm doing `dd if=/dev/hda of=/dev/hdb` ... does it matter whether /dev/hda is mounted read only or not?
will any of the files on /dev/hda be in use?

/dev/hda is a partitioned drive with 1 of the partitions being my current OS... i have a separate drive for /home/ ... i'm wondering if mounting it read only is enough or if i need to boot from a live cd & do it that way
I'd boot from a Live CD and then dd the partition
